document.full_text: verizon communications inc  gained wireless subscribers with apple inc's  iphone, but the effect on its financials failed to impress investors, who sent its shares down 2.3 percent.
document.title: iphone helps verizon, but not enough for some
lines_and_colors: verizon communications inc  gained wireless subscribers with apple inc's  iphone, but the effect on its financials failed to impress investors, who sent its shares down 2.3 percent.
